author: mintystark
name: StarkNight
description:
This theme was ment to go with the "MediterraneanNight Series" Theme:

http://gnome-look.org/content/show.php/?content=156782

 
Also one minor issue I noticed amongst many themes was that Panel items where not consistent with sizes, hover effects, padding, etc. S0 this theme was aimed at trying to get those more consistent.
 

I personally don't like items in the panel touching the bottom.  I like them with the same padding as the top. So by default the panel Height is set to 33px.  However this creates a small side affect, you wont be able to slide your mouse along the very bottom of the screen to select an item.  You will need to be a few pixels above.  This doesn't bother me at all, but I know it might bother others.  So if that is the case for you then you can change the Panel Settings and force set the Panel hieght to 30px.
